data.title: Douglas Jackson
data.meta_description: Douglas Jackson serves as General Counsel at Magnus Investments, LLC, a real estate development company located in Seattle, Washington. Before joining Magnus in 1995, Douglas served for approximately five years at Microsoft Corporation as an international corporate attorney. Douglas served three years as a General Litigator at the Perkins Coie law firm in Seattle and worked at the law firm of Kim, Chang & Lee in Seoul, Korea.
data.text:
Douglas Jackson serves as General Counsel at Magnus Investments, LLC, a real estate development company located in Seattle, Washington.

Before joining Magnus in 1995, Douglas served for approximately five years at Microsoft Corporation as an international corporate attorney. Douglas served three years as a General Litigator at the Perkins Coie law firm in Seattle and worked at the law firm of Kim, Chang & Lee in Seoul, Korea.

Douglas obtained his J.D. at Harvard Law School and obtained his B.A. in Italian and English Literatures at Stanford University. Douglas has traveled extensively in Europe and Asia.
